name: The Pentagon
description:
The Pentagon is a game made in 2 days.

In this game you are a Pentagon spawned in a dungeon room and you can explore other rooms , where you will find loot crates and enemies .

                        Feature

Procedural Generation (With Random Loot Crates , Enemies And Difficulty In Each Room)

Inventory System

Shop

Weapons - (Pistol)

Minimap

                      Controls

Left Mouse Button - Shoot With A Weapon

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

E - Open Loot Crate / Pick Up Items / Open Shop

Q - Drop Items

Developer Website(Other Games) : http://redcodyred.website2.me/
